description.value:
You can conceal items inside a hidden compartment in one of your limbs (such as an arm, leg, or tail) and protect them with a passcode. The compartment holds items of negligible Bulk and items of light Bulk that are small enough to fit in your limb or can otherwise be folded or contracted to fit. A hideaway in a leg (in a human) can typically hold more than one in an arm, and your size also adjusts the capacity at the GM's discretion.

When the compartment is closed, the seam in your limb is difficult to detect. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal an Object in a hideaway limb. Though this compartment can foil a cursory pat down, many security checkpoints include a scan to detect such devices.

Effect You Interact to draw an item @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] in your hideaway limb.
